title: Fall of the Western Roman Empire
description: The Western Roman Empire fell to the Germanic chieftain Odoacer, marking the end of ancient Rome and the beginning of the Middle Ages.

title: Signing of the Magna Carta
description: King John of England agreed to the Magna Carta, a document that limited royal power and laid the foundation for constitutional government.

title: Industrial Revolution Begins
description: The Industrial Revolution began in Great Britain, transforming manufacturing, transportation, and society.

title: World War I Begins
description: World War I started after the assassination of Archduke Franz Ferdinand, leading to a global conflict involving many major powers.

title: Moon Landing
description: Apollo 11 mission successfully landed humans on the Moon, marking a major milestone in space exploration.
